EN.EQUIPMENT_LEVEL: You need to be level {0} to equip this.
EN.EQUIPMENT_WRONGCLASS: Your class cannot use this Item.
EN.NOTICE_1: Go to the Google Play Store and rate Retro RPG Online!
EN.TUTORIAL_MOVE: Click or Tap on land to move.
EN.TUTORIAL_ATTACK: Now click or tap on a Monster to attack
EN.TUTORIAL_ATTACK2: Thats it now kill more Monsters.
EN.TUTORIAL_EQUIP: Now I want to equip my brought gear by going into Menu Backpack and selecting it.
EN.TUTORIAL_SHOPBUY: I should find the Beginner Store by going to the menu and pressing Town.
EN.TUTORIAL_SHOPBUY2: I want to buy my first Armor and Weapon that is Level 10.
EN.TUTORIAL_STATS: You can now assign custom Stats in Menu >> Character >> 3rd Page (Character Stats),
EN.TUTORIAL_PORTAL: In the Town House move to the blue Portal near the bottom left.
EN.SHOP_NOSPACE: There is not enough space in your inventory.
EN.SHOP_MISMATCH: The price has been changed, please try again.
EN.AUCTION_ADDED: The auction item you listed has been added.
EN.SHOP_NOCRAFTITEMS: You do not have enough craft Items.
EN.ATTACK_TOOFAR: You are too far away to attack.
EN.TUTORIAL_1: To Move, Mouse click on the Map or an Object, or use the WASD or arrow keys.
EN.TUTORIAL_2: To Attack, Mouse click on the Object or get in attack range and press Space bar.
EN.TUTORIAL_3: To Cycle Targets, use keys T to target the closest Object or Y to reverse target.
EN.TUTORIAL_4: You can use Keys 1-4 for Skill Shortcuts, and Keys 5-8 for consumables like Potions.
EN.TUTORIAL_5: If you need to buy items you can select Menu >> Town to instantly warp to Town.
EN.TUTORIAL_6: At level 10 you can equip Items in Menu >> Equipment, and at level 20 you can assign Stat Points.
EN.ACHIEVEMENTS_2_COMPLETE: Achievement - Do {0} Damage to Monsters Completed. {1}XP Added.
EN.ACHIEVEMENTS_5_COMPLETE: Achievement - Interact with {0} Objects Completed. {1}XP Added.
EN.PARTY_CANNOT_KICK: You cannot kick as you are not in a party or leader.
EN.PARTY_PLAYER_KICKED: You have been kicked from the party.
EN.PARTY_NOT_LEADER: You cannot set the leader as you are not in a party.
EN.PARTY_NOT_IN: You cannot leave as you are not in a party.
EN.HARVEST_INVALID: You cannot harvest at this point, use the right weapon, try somewhere else or again later.
EN.HARVEST_ADDED: {0} has been added to your inventory
EN.HARVEST_WRONG_TYPE: You cannot use this with a {0}.
EN.HARVEST_NO_WEAPON: You do not have a harvest item equipped.
DIALOGUE_1: What do you mean where you are? Anyway I need help son.
You see, young one, my house, well, it's not quite the welcoming place it used to be.
It's overrun by rats, scurrying through every nook and cranny, making themselves right at home.
It's a bit of a mess, I'm afraid. Can you kill 10 rats for me, Sonny?
That way I can get into my home again.
DIALOGUE_2: Rats have stolen my 3 dice I need you to kill some Rats to get them.
DIALOGUE_3: Rats have stolen my tasty cheese.
DIALOGUE_4: Hello I was writing my memiors earlier..
When a pesky Crab stole my Feather Quilt.
The problem is I don't know which one stole it
So I need you to kill and search all of them until it's found.
DIALOGUE_6: Fires were started by Goblins after they left the area
I need you to put out some fires so they don't get out of control.
DIALOGUE_7: The graveyard is overrun with Skeletons.
I need you to remove the tombstones.
This will prevent the evil wizards resurrecting people in graves.
QUESTS_NONE: I have no more quests for you.
QUESTS_NONE_0: I have no more quests for you, head EAST and look for Baelan.
QUESTS_NONE_1: I have no more quests for you, head SOUTH and look for Caelum.
QUESTS_NONE_2: I have no more quests for you, head WEST and look for Darian.
QUESTS_NONE_3: I have no more quests for you, head WEST and look for Eldryn.
QUESTS_NONE_4: I have no more quests for you, head NORTH and look for Faelan.
QUESTS_NONE_5: I have no more quests for you, head NORTH and look for Gavriel.
QUESTS_NONE_6: I have no more quests for you, head EAST and look for NPC.

1: Thank you when you have completed this return to me.
2: Please get the dice and return to me when complete.
Come back when you have my %count% %name%.
I can now gamble hardcore with my lucky dice.
3: Can you please kill rats and return my cheese?
I need %count% pieces back to me.
4: Can you please kill Crabs and return my Feather Quill?
Thank-you for returning my Feather Quill.
I can now resume writing my memiors.
7: Can you destroy %count% tombstones for me?

QUESTS_MOB: Have you killed %count% %name%s for me yet?
QUESTS_ITEM: %name2%'s have stolen my %count% %name%s'. I need you to kill %name2%'s and get my %name%s' back.
Thank you for returning my %name%'s now I can use them.
